## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8822a2e46635ec55aa07e8237606984fbc1b1fed504af23fcb935dda5e76c41d)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-nutmeg-stockpile-999' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
